availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin M. Hitt (Carroll Co. State Rep.)

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, State Representative. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth Fearn Hitt in 1863 in Trimble County, Kentucky. Served in the Kentucky House of Representatives from 1859 to 1861. State Representative from Carroll County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District 2, p. 53.
Marriage Records. Kentucky Marriages. Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky.
Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, Collins' Historical Sketches of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Covington, KY: Collins & Co., 1882), 118.
